cast.name: 鲍勃·霍斯金斯 Bob Hoskins
克里斯托弗·洛伊德 Christopher Lloyd

writer.name: 彼得·S·西曼 Peter S. Seaman
杰弗里·普赖斯 Jeffrey Price

this_title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit: Before and After
trans_title: 《谁陷害了兔子罗杰》：之前和之后
introduction: This piece provides glimpses of shots that include animation. This segment follows Eddie's first few minutes in Toontown and lasts three minutes and seven seconds. On the top part of the split screen, we see the completed scenes. On the bottom, we watch the actors as they perform without the added animation. This offers a very cool look at the source material, and it further helps us appreciate all the work the actors
chinese_title: 《谁陷害了兔子罗杰》：之前和之后
foreign_title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit: Before and After
